name: Josh Bankston
text: It was our first time doing an escape room and had a blast!   Good pricing and great staff.   Highly recommend if you're in the area and looking for something fun to do.

name: Anna Clardy
text: This place was terrible. Some friends and I went last weekend and found the key to our room in 15 minutes and were confused because we’d barely opened any boxes. The guy working told us our room had been put back together wrong and items and clues were out of order and he didn’t know why. He wasn’t going to give us our money back or anything, we had to ask him if we could come back again the next week since it was a waste of time and money. He let us do that so that was the only good thing. We literally came back this weekend and our room was messed up AGAIN. We were missing clues and nothing made sense, we tried to call for clues/help multiple times and had to wait TWENTY minutes until after time ran out when the worker finally came back. So basically we spent 20 minutes looking for clues that werent there then we sat in our room for over 30 minutes just waiting on someone to come help us and let us out. It was absolutely ridiculous. We still never got our money back and we refused to come back again for another “correct” room. In addition to all of that, THE DESCRIPTIONS OF THEIR ROOMS ON THE WEBSITE ARE NOT WHAT THE ROOM ARE ACTUALLY LIKE. we were disappointed because we chose both of our rooms based on the online description yet when we got in both rooms the storyline was COMPLETELY different. Super unprofessional, the workers hardly know the clues or how the rooms work themselves. I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone. One of my worst experiences and I will never go back. PLEASE SAVE YOUR TIME AND MONEY AND GO TO BREAKOUT TUSCALOOSA INSTEAD!!

name: Bethany Donaldson
text: We had my son’s birthday party here. It was a huge hit with both parents & kids! The kids all worked together to solve the clues. Definitely recommend!

name: Kimberly Smith
text: I wish there was an option for zero stars! This is the biggest waste of 20 dollars I’ve ever spent. The associate was nice but had no clue what was supposed to happen in the room. These five star ratings have to be fake! When I asked for a refund the associate shrugged and said nobody in the store can give refunds and to call the corporate office for a refund DO NOT GO TO THIS PLACE

resp.text: Hey Kimberly, could you send your contact information to mgr115@allinadventures.com. I would like to discuss this further with you. Thanks! Have a great day!

name: YourCurlfriend 1
text: The rooms we chose were a bit challenging but the staff was great! We accepted the challenge twice within 7 days and we’ll be back again. I can’t wait!

name: Jeffrey Phipps
text: Great way of putting down the phone and reminding ourselves the family can work together when you locked in a room.UCF the true national champions undefeated and beat Auburn.

name: Ryan West
text: Pretty fun experience but not very elaborate. A little on the plain side with few props and decorations compared to other escape rooms that cost around $20.

name: Kristie Abernathy
text: Only reason I picked a star was to write this review! This place was the biggest waste of money I’ve ever EVER spent!!!!! This place deserves a negative 5 stars!!!! Close it down!

name: Alex Gray
text: Fun

name: Valerie Cates
text: I booked an escape room for my son's 16th birthday as we wanted to do something different. He and his three best friends had a great time. Not wanting to be "in the way", I stayed out, but followed their progress via closed circuit cameras. I felt this adventure was a great value...money well spent for the fun memories we have. Additionally, the staff there was incredibly helpful and polite. You also get a great team picture when the game is over.

resp.text: Valerie thank you so much we appreciate being able to host a fantastic party.  Thank you so much for allowing us to be the birthday entertainment. We can’t wait to see you again soon.

name: Julie Anderson
text:
Love. love. love. this place. This was our second time here and it is far away better than any other escape room we have done. Just challenging enough to make it exciting yet all the clues are there, waiting for us to be uncover them.

We were a group of three adults and two children ages 10 and 13. Everyone in our group uncovered clues and helped us escape. It was definitely a team effort.

We will definitely be going back.

Edit: Max was our awesome game master!  Thank you for a great experience Max!!

resp.text: Julie, thank you so much for the kind words. We are so excited to be a source of local entertainment for your family. There is nothing better for team building than an escape room.  Max is definitely one of the best. She definitely brings to life the overall experience and adds her own flare. Thank you again and we can’t wait to see you again soon

name: Anna F.
text: My boyfriend and I did the “Secret Society” room for a fun date night and it was an amazing experience! Natalie was super helpful with the explanation and the hints when we needed them! The escape room we did was VERY complex but enjoyable and very doable with only two people. It was our first time in an escape room, but we did not feel totally lost. It was a 10/10 experience and I cannot wait to try another room at Escape Enterprise!

resp.text: Anna, thank you so much for the 10/10. Secret Society is one of my favorites. It is a fantastic room for team building or date night      Natalie is an amazing game master with so much energy adding to the overall experience. Thank you so much and we can’t wait to see you again soon.

name: Rebel Mike Potter
text: The room "Flight 2076" was setup to look like an airplane. The room was slightly difficult but enjoyable. The attendant "Emily" was probably the best that we've had at any escape rooms we've been too, throughout Florida and Alabama. She was knowledgeable, personable, had a great sense of humor. Even though we didn't escape this room she made our experience more pleasurable. I would definitely recommend Escape Enterprise LLC, and would specifically ask for Emily.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the compliments on our room Flight 2076. EmmaLea is in fact amazing at her job and does an amazing job at adding to the overall experience here at Escape Enterprise.  We thank you for choosing to stay local with us and for allowing us to serve you and provide good quality entertainment.

name: Jon
text: This sure was a fun and thrilling experience! “The Shack” was way better than I hoped it would be. My family and I were stumped a few times, but it’s great that you can ask for hints from your Game Master. Thank you EmmaLea. You Rock! On the way home, we were already discussing which room will be our next one. “Flight 2076!”

resp.text: Jon, thank you for your kind words. We love being able to provide a family friendly local experience. The shack is an amazing room. You will also love Flight 2076. As for EmmaLea she is doing a fantastic job and is an amazing game master.  She definitely goes above and beyond to make each guests experience one they won’t forget.

name: Joseph Fuller
text: Took my kids . Our first time doing an escape room . Michell was amazing and so sweet . Definitely going to go back . If not to do another escape room then at least to see that game masters pretty face .

resp.text: Joseph thank you. I will pass that on to her. We appreciate the fact that you decided to join us for some local entertainment.

name: Shadowtheguy 912
text: Really nice people, and the Game Master Max(Is that what their called?) was incredibly nice both times I was there. Thank you for dealing with me and my misfit friends. Definitely coming again.

resp.text: You nailed it they are the game masters max does do an incredible job. We thank you so much for the repeat business, we have so much more new coming out that we can’t wait to show you.

name: the fool

She mentioned being the manager and had an awesome Among Us tattoo 😄 Definitely would recommend trying them all out!

resp.text: You guys just rocked it 3 games in one day. That’s amazing. Thank you so much for supporting us and keeping it local.  Our staff is top notch and all of them perform at a level that is above and beyond expectation. Thank you guys so much.

name: Robert Bergeron
text: Max is the ultimate game master! She did a great job making sure we had a wonderful time. I can't wait for a new room to open. Thanks Max...

text: I went with my 2 son's(8 and 13).  We had a blast.  The younger son was a little nervous about being locked in a dark box but Bunny Max did an amazing job of making it fun for him.

name: Matt Crawford
text: Nate was our game master and he was AWESOME. We did "the shack". The attention to detail in that room is awesome! It wasn't too hard, but wasn't a walk in the park either. It really made you think. We will be back every chance we get. Also, the tee-shirts are super comfortable, and the owner Aaron, is a super nice guy.  If you are looking for a great place to go and have fun as a family, I highly suggest Escape Enterprise.

resp.text: Matt, thanks for taking the time to come and experience our local family fun entertainment.  You guys were awesome and did an amazing job in the Shack.  We can't wait to see you again soon.

name: Olivia Holland
text: Such a fun experience! Max and Emily were amazing and made our experience so much fun. I will definitely be coming back.

name: Caitlyn Lindsey
text: Such a great thing to do with friends and family!! And the rooms here really make you think! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Caitlyn thank you so much. We love being able to offer immersive yet challenging entertainment to friends and family alike. We will see you soon.

name: Brittany Straughn
text: My girlfriend and I had so much fun!! Max was our game master and she did fantastic! We loved it so much we stayed for a second game and they even gave us a discount!! Honestly can not wait to go back!

resp.text: Brittany you guys were awesome. Thank you so much for allowing us to be your local entertainment. You guys were awesome in both rooms and it was a pleasure to meet you both.  Max is amazing at what she does and definite adds so much to the overall experience.

name: Jennifer Potter
text: We have been to a few different escape rooms and this one is very well themed! We did not escape from the Flight 2076 room but we had a lot of fun and our hostess, Emily, was fantastic!! I would definitely love to go back and try the other rooms.

resp.text: Jennifer you guys did a great job in Flight 2076. It is such an awesome room providing a little memorial as well as some fantastic local entertainment. EmmaLea does a great job of providing quality expertise as a game master she is among the best.

name: Faye Satchell
text: My family enjoyed the “Shack” escape room . This was our first time experiencing this awesome game , our game guide MAX was super nice and explained things well, she also made us laugh a few times! I recommend this place to friends and family ! (:

resp.text: The Shack one of our most immersive rooms. You guys do amazing at it.  Max is an amazing game master. Gate thank you and your family for joining us for some awesome local entertainment.  We can’t wait to see you again soon.

name: Chris Heiniger
text: An excellent fun family activity! Very well executed with enough of a challenge to make it interesting for everyone. I definitely recommend checking this place out.

name: Kayla East
text: We did the Secret Society room and absolutely loved it! Mac was our game master and she was so helpful for us... As we were pretty clueless as to what to do going it to it! The staff in general were so sweet and knowledgeable!

resp.text: Thank you so much. Max is amazing at what she does. We can’t wait to see you back soon. We have so much more to show you guys.

name: justin campbell
text: We brought our Youth group here tonight. The rooms were great! Max and Emmalea were great game masters!! Definitely going back again.

resp.text: Justin thank you so much we love the fact that we can provide some local family style fun for you guys. It is our pleasure to entertain. Thank you for letting us have the opportunity.

name: J T
text: Had a lot of fun at the escape room. The staff was very friendly and the place is set up very well. That said, I felt like the rooms could have had a more cohesive narrative that drive you in the direction of a logical progression of solving the puzzles. The airplane themed room didn't seem to have any rhyme or reason as to what order you did things in and as a result we found ourselves looking for clues that we hadn't unlocked yet. If there had been something that told us where to go and when I felt like it would have been a much better experience. We did finish but with not much time left. The magician's room was much the same way, there just wasn't anything to tell us where to begin or where to go or what to do and that made it very frustrating for us. You end up just looking at the materials that are provided and trying a bunch of numbers on a bunch of different locks which isn't very much fun. The puzzles were good but without any idea of what order to do them in it just made things kind of a frantic mess. We will definitely go again to try some of the other rooms and I know that the owner seems to read and reply to feedback so I hope I've given enough information. Don't let this just keep you from going, it was a great experience and with a little work I feel like it could be excellent.

resp.text: JT first off thank you guys so much for letting us provide your local entertainment for the weekend.  I am sorry that you felt like there was no rhyme or reason to the rooms we have spent meticulous hours crafting them. With that said though we do not just place a room and let it be, we like to call our rooms a living creation. Each room has a lifecycle that it goes through. Those two are the newest ones we have.  They were created then tested then changed and tweaked then retested. Now as our guests go through the rooms we know that there are continuous tweaks that will need to be made in order to make the room amazing.  I thank you so much for the comments it does help to continue that lifecycle of the rooms.  I am not here to tell you that our rooms are the best around and will not change for anyone because that is just dumb. We take our guests seriously and want everyone to enjoy their time with us.  From the sounds of it, you guys have done quite a few rooms, if you have the time I would love to set up an appointment with you to discuss some of the more intricate parts of the games that you had issues with.  Send me an email at info@escapeenterprise.com and lets get together and talk escape stuff.  Thank you again for supporting local it really does mean a lot to us.

name: jake ryan
text: Had an awesome time in the Vanishing Act escape room! Max was extremely nice and helpful to us during our game. Thank you, Max!

resp.text: Jake, thank you for choosing the vanishing act it is such a fun experience. Max truly is an amazing game master. She pushes the limits on each experience to make it better than the last.

name: Sarah Aronack
text: Very cool local business with super friendly staff. Emily was our gamemaster and was very sweet and helpful and had such a great attitude with our chaotic group of 6 which included our 4 boys. We will definitely be back again!

resp.text: Sarah thank you so much. It means the world to us that you love our local entertainment. Secret society is an awesome room especially for families, it has some great secrets to discover. EmmaLea is an awesome game master and brings so much to the experience we strive to give you guys.  Thank you.

name: Eliii
text: i had a really great time natalie was a great host

resp.text: Thank you so much. Natalie does do an amazing job as the senior gamemaster and trainer she pretty much rocks it and helps make the escape room what it is.

name: Brittany Boehme
text: We did the Shack and escaped at the last minute! This was a cool, creepy set up as if we were actually out in the woods. Emily and Max did a great job and we're very friendly and helpful when we needed it. Will definitely come back for more escape rooms.

resp.text: The shack is one of the crowd favorites.  We tried our best to be able to get as much realism and immersion into our rooms to provide quality entertainment.  EmmaLea and Max are amazing gamesters that often far exceed expectations.  They are definitely world class at what they do.  Thank you

name: Shelby Thompson

We appreciate the fact that you guys stayed local for your entertainment we can’t wait to see you again soon.

name: Makayla Sherburne

name: Rafael M
text: Great experience, the room was very challenging and fun. 10/10 would recommend for anyone.

resp.text: Rafael, thank so much for the compliment we can’t wait to see you guys back soon.

name: Alexxa Valdovinos
text: My family and I went for my birthday and it was so much fun! Escape rooms are my favorite thing to do. This was my first time at Escape Enterprise and it did not disappoint. She was sweet, helpful and fun. The service and the experience were both great!

resp.text: Alexxa thank you and Happy Birthday to you. We are so glad that you chose to spend your birthday with us.  We can't wait to show you what is to come in the future, and how excited we are to be able to serve our small town.

name: jessie sneed
text: This was our first visit and we had so much fun!! Max was our game master and she was awesome.... we will definitely be back.

resp.text: Jessie thank you for allowing us to be your local entertainment for the night. The shack is an awesome room to choose from its level of immersion is amazing.  We can’t wait to show you what else we have for you guys to try.

name: Gretchen Gonzalez

resp.text: Gretchen thank you so much. I know you guys are t here but thank you for supporting local business. If you all visit again come on over and hang out.

name: J R
text: We took my son and 3 of his friends on his 9th birthday. I was worried they would be scared, but they were too busy having fun to be scared. We had the BEST time! The decor was so awesome, the staff was great, and the price was totally worth it. I can’t wait to go back and try another room. Escape Enterprise is a great place for all ages to have a blast!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much. We love being local entertainment for birthdays to just friends or family. You guys were so fun to hang out with. We can’t wait for you to come back and continue the story.

name: cynthia peebles
text: We traveled from Andalusia Al. to Escape Enterprise. We booked ahead and signed all our waivers online before we got there which made our process quicker. The room we did was called the Shack...the room itself was very well set up and very real feeling. Nate helped us by giving us clues (lots of clues🤣🤣) He even joked along with us on the screen which again made us laugh. I took my daughter and 2 of her friends to celebrate my daughter turning sixteen...we all had a blast. The whole process from booking online to actually going through the room was a great experience. Give Nate a high 5 he deserves it.....because we were clueless and without him it would not have been as fun.

resp.text:
Thank you so much and Happy Birthday.

resp.text: Well thank you Jeremy

resp.text: Thank you our part was small the Parks and Recreation department and the sponsors made this happen.

For Military and Veterans, be sure to let them know. We will go again? ABSOLUTELY!

resp.text: Thank you so much you guys were awesome and we really appreciate you letting us be your entertainment for the night.Nate is a fantastic game master that keeps it fun and entertaining.

name: lynnda St Clair

text: Secret society was made with the intention that you can't get through it in one attempt. Takes the fun out of it when it was made for you to fail. Go to Daleville. Much better rooms with amazing staff and cheaper rooms.

resp.text: First off thank for coming we appreciate your business. Secret Society was not designed for you to fail but we did design it to be hard. We designed each room to be at a different level of difficulty to accommodate the different levels of customers going through escape rooms. We do not puzzle out the rooms to allow people to come back and try again if they like.  Secret society is our most difficult room. It is also our most technical room. We strive to continually update and make our rooms better. I welcome any discussion you would be willing to have about how we can strive to be better. You can reach me at info@escapeenterprise.com

text: Not very professional. Over priced for the quailty of the room. Hints could have been alot better and puzzles could have been thought through.. I have played. Other places in the area with much better quailty rooms for a lesser price.

resp.text: Well first of all thank you for coming out and trying our rooms. I would like the opportunity to speak with you and find out some specifics about your experience. We pride ourselves on running a professional business with rooms made to a high standard. It would help me to better our rooms and your experience if you could tell em what room you tried and when you tried it so I can talk to my staff about any hints that they may have given.  I will go back and check the video to see what they typed and make sure to change any hints that were not up to par. We thank you again for supporting local business. You can reach out to me at info@escapeenterprise.com.  I look forward to hearing from you.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for coming first off we appreciate it. If you have time, please contact me at info@escapeenterprise.com we strive to continually improve our rooms.

Update
Thank you again for your input we have made some changes based on that input and we are proud to say that it has definitely improved the game.

name: Earthangel888
text: I've turned escape rooms into a personal hobby after my first experience in Texas a few years ago. Imagine my delight when I found one in the city of Auburn! The manager is very friendly,patient,and personable. Even though he temporarily lacks sufficient staff at the moment, he is still able to deliver a fun experience for everyone. He deserves a good staff !  Apply if you enjoy creating fun experiences for people! I plan on booking more rooms in the near future and bringing more people with me next time! My friend and I chose "Imprisoned" and I'm glad that he enjoyed his first escape room.

name: Deborah Williams
text: I had such a great time! It was a little hard but not too difficult and was super fun and satisfying, I got out with 1 minute! Our game master Dawson was great too! Coming back tomorrow!

name: DeMarcus Butler
text: Had a blast! Went with the wife and two teenager boys and took on the medium difficulty room. The puzzles required thought and a keen eye, and were extremely fun to solve. Will definitely be back to tackle one of the harder rooms. Oh yeah, we made it out in time.

name: Dimode Rhee
text:
Event started normally with the game master explaining rules, objectives, & information regarding opening locks. Throughout the game, I noticed we actually had to open the escape room door to ask if anyone was there to help us—we had multiple hints. Even received extra with beverage purchases... the hint providing service was slow. Secondly, before the game started we were informed that the room had a tough lock to open where every group struggled... understandable... we received the hint to open the tough lock but failed to open so we called for assistance. Hilariously enough, even the game master struggled to open the lock... this whole process of opening one, tough lock took approximately 15 minutes—1/4 of our game time. With the intention of completing destroying the lock and my foot on the wall, I had to pull that one lock off with all my force after the game master left. But the game master assured that the time would get frozen—cool.
Thirdly, when time was up... the game master does not hesitate to end the entire game by punching in the last code spoiling everything. There was not a single thought in the game master’s mind to ask us whether we desired just a bit more time to crack the room... Game master simply walked in, punched the code, and we all stood there awkwardly, confused, & disappointed.
We complained about the lock... their response was there was prior information given before the game—true. We recommended them to please replace it immediately
We asked if there was anything that could be done to remedy our dissatisfaction with the room and the fact we paid $200 for one hour to elapse so unfortunately. They informed us that it was up to the owner to perform refunds, but the manager informed us with a possible discount sent through our email. It’s been a week... nothing. Obviously, their customer service skills need to be reevaluated.
Was a real tragic end to a group’s Friday night honestly. We went in expecting to have fun whether we escaped or not... but we felt robbed. Hopefully future groups will not experience the extreme dissatisfaction like we did.
PSA: DON’T PICK THE VAULT ROOM.

name: amy dilmar
text: Thank you for a good time. Great customer service! Minor tweaks such as a few clues on laminated paper weren't erased from last group. Fun and enjoyable!

resp.text: Hmmm, we’ll do better!

text: Auburn Escape Zone is AWESOME!!!! We traveled from Columbus, Ga to check them out. It was worth the drive. The staff is professional and respectful. I love how they engage with the customers to make sure their experience is a great one. We will definitely be going back soon.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Z!  I cherish your review and can’t wait to have you back. We need all the support we can get during this tough time, bring some friends and play again!

Brandon Jameson

text: Both of our experiences have been amazing! Erin and Ashlyn, our game leaders were very helpful and made the experience great. Our family loves the challenge of solving the puzzles and we have made it out both times!

resp.text: Amazing!  Y'all are 2 for 2.  Hope you'll try them all!

name: Jay Hartin
text: I've done 16 escape room across 3 states, and I was pleased with my experience with Auburn Escape Zones. Online booking was a breeze and our on-site service went smoothly. We did The Vault. The room concept was original and the puzzles were fair and evenly split between the two sections. Our game master, Riley, was great. She was attentive and helpful. We look forward to coming back to try the Puzzler Room.

resp.text: Thanks, Jay.  The idea of a cooperative room is daunting to some, so glad you enjoyed it.  I appreciate hearing that our Team is performing well!

name: Nathaniel Lazard
text: I had a great experience here. I’ve gone here many times before and with this pandemic I’m really glad to know the team here is working diligently to provide safe and clean fun for everyone by increasing room sanitation and adhering by state regulation.

resp.text: Thank you Nathaniel! We work hard to make sure that all of our guests have a safe, fun experience and were so glad that you enjoyed yourself! We hope to see you back soon!

name: Sierra Jacobs
text: Their rooms are great. The people are great when I’m there, and they would get an otherwise perfect score, but everytime I call them no one ever answers the phone. There have been times where I’m literally in the middle of booking a room and at 1 min over the time I can’t book it. I tried calling to ask if it was still available, and no answers EVERY time. Even if I’m not asking about a room and just calling to ask questions, I haven’t gotten an answer. I shouldn’t have to drive there in person to talk to someone, or just book online to interact with you all.

resp.text: Hi Sierra,  as we are a 'reservations' venue we are usually not in the building when no rooms are booked.  The 1 min issue you mentioned is a feature where games are no longer bookable within 60 minutes of the start time--this protects us from someone booking the 4:00 room at 3:55 and we're not prepared--once that time has passed the room 'falls off' of the website.  As for you having trouble reaching someone we are rarely in the building during the week (unless a room is booked Wed or Thurs) and we're there answering calls during business hours Fri-Sun when it's busy.  Beyond that we check our voicemails X2 daily and respond to calls as quickly as possible.  We're so glad you enjoyed our rooms and would love to host you again, I recommend email or FB messenger if you don't reach anyone on the landline (if we're there we'll answer!).  Thanks for coming in!

name: Rachael White
text: Our staff of 17 went on day leadership retreat and Auburn Escape Zones did everything they could to make our experience awesome! We had a schedule change last min and they were able to graciously accommodate. We loved it and we all had so much fun!

resp.text: We are so glad y'all had a great time, can't wait to host you again soon!

name: MoNique Gaines-Harris
text:
If you are looking for a challenging fun-filled excursion, you will definitely find it here! We are becoming somewhat of escape room enthusiasts, and Auburn Escape Zones is currently our favorite. We are closer to Columbus, GA escape rooms, but they were booked, so we decided to take the short ride to Auburn, and it was worth it. The staff was professional and accomodating while adhering to public health guidelines pertaining to COVID-19.
We did the Cave room and will be returning to escape the Vault!

resp.text: So glad y'all made the drive MoNique!  Josh at Exodus has some great rooms as well but we'd love to have you back to try all of our challenges.  Hope you get hooked like we are!

We googled family things to do in area and Auburn Escape Rooms came up. We booked the cabin escape room for 6 of us. We ESCAPED with 7 seconds remaining! We absolutely loved it. We now are gonna make it a family thing for us to do each time we come to visit our son! Highly reccommended!!!! The staff was amazing and so friendly and it was set up i side the building so nice and clean!! Thanks so much!
THE MCKAY FAMILY

name: Todd Scholl
text: Great time for my sales team from The Hotel at Auburn University!!!  We had several rooms and think it was so valuable want to return when they get their "racing rooms" ready so we can get competitive between departments.  Definitely need at least 3 people but 5 was a great number in our room.  We will be back and refer them for team building fun to our clients!

resp.text: Todd aka Tony, what a great group you brought.  It was so much fun having you guys escape with us.  Can't wait for you all to come back.  Thanks for passing our name along to people who stay at the hotel!  Make sure you tell them to tell us that Todd sent them!

name: Andrew Smith
text: Myself and members of our group loved Escape Zones! We met Dave, one of the owners, on the first night and had such a great time that we came back the next day. The puzzles were challenging but fun and the stories behind the rooms were great. We loved knowing that the owners came up with the ideas themselves and that it was not part of a franchise. I recommend visiting Escape Zones in Auburn!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words. Your group was a lot of fun and we hope you guys slay Blackbeard!

name: Miles Parker
text: Staff was friendly and very punctual. We did the Imprisonment challenge, and it was a blast! Puzzles were challenging, but not impossible. Price is pretty good too. I'm excited to doing my next one, and I highly recommend Escape Zone to anyone looking for something fun to do.

resp.text: Miles, we enjoyed having you and Kittye out tonight!  Very impressed at how well you guys did.  Hope you bring your brother and friends with you next time!  Happy Valentines!

name: Abigail Starns
text: One of the better ones we've been too

resp.text: Love that endorsement, Abigail!  Hope we can have you back for our other adventures soon.

name: Lakisha Haynes
text: If you haven't been, go! We went with a group of people and it was both challenging and fun. We had an awesome time. All of the staff members were super nice and energetic/outstanding!

resp.text: Loved you guys coming out!  Such a fun group!

name: Laura Runion
text: Unfortunately I can't give this zero stars! I booked online and, we got there early. We were told there was another group in the room we had booked. We waited half an hour then were asked to follow a girl to the back where we were told they had "double booked" The room. They offered us  us another room, one not as difficult but didn't offer to comp it! We did ultimately take a refund but left really, really unhappy. We won't be back. There's another place in Moore's Mill!

resp.text: Laura, I'm so sorry for the experience you had at our business.  Having messaged with you personally I feel that we've resolved the issue as best as possible.  We are a family-owned small business that thrives on word-of-mouth advertising.  I don't want to make excuses as to why this scenario unfolded the way it did, only want to convey my sincerest apologies for the perfect storm of bad timing that your group walked in to (city sewer system was backing up into our bathroom, manager was out of the building dealing with that issue, newer employee didn't recognize that there were 2 groups booked for that time slot).  As a fellow SBO you know that there are occasionally times when all the holes in the cheese line up and things happen.  We do everything we can to mitigate these events but this time we failed you and feel terrible.  --Shawn

name: Holly Batal
text: Great way to spend an afternoon. Older kids loved it!

resp.text: Many thanks for the kind words, Holly.  We'd love to host you again soon!

name: Sean Cornelius
text: PHENOMENAL experience. They packaged AMAZING value while being super affordable. Some places charge as much as double. I'm not saying thoses places are not good....I'm saying we really enjoyed ourselves here. Meeting the owners and getting to know them and their story added to the value of the experience. I would recommend this place and we're for sure going back to beat the other rooms.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We really enjoyed having you guys here and can't wait for you to come back.

name: Brittany Israel
text: I wanted to experience something new with my family as a big birthday celebration. This was the perfect outting for us as we are very competitive and love to solve puzzles and riddles. We chose the Cabin as our escape room and had the best time. The puzzles are all intriguing and require a little bit of focus and memory, but with some teamwork and brainstorming we were able to make it out just in time. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms soon, I can't say enough about Auburn Escape Zones. Thank you for making my birthday a day to remember!

resp.text: We are so thankful you chose us to celebrate with.  Hopefully fun memories were made.  Come back soon!

name: Tracy Brunson
text: My family had the opportunity to make a memory that will last forever thanks to the kind people at Auburn Escape Zone. They graciously incorporated a surprise engagement proposal from our future son-in-law to our daughter. We did the  Black Beard's Brig which was exciting and very challenging. It required teamwork from the whole family. This was an awesome experience that everyone should try.

resp.text: Tracy we loved being a part of such a special evening.  It was humbling sharing this moment with you all. Blessings on you and your family.

name: David Moore
text: Had a great time with my wife and kids! Just needed 5 more minutes!!!

resp.text: So glad y’all came in to play. Escape Rooms are a learned skill, the more you play the better you’ll do. Hope to see you again!

name: Kaylee Wynn
text: This was my family's first experience with an escape room. We were trying to find something to do with my kid brother and we were not sure what we were expecting when we pulled up, but we ended up having a blast! The employees are very friendly and helped made the experience more enjoyable! I recommend it!

resp.text: Kaylee we enjoyed meeting you and your family.  We pray you have a wonderful Easter and come back to do all our rooms!

name: Leadership Lee County
text: We took a large group (34 people) to Auburn Escape Zones and they were very accommodating. It is the best place for a corporate team building experience! resp.text: We've just hosted you again almost 3 years later.  So thankful for our loyal customer base!

name: Crystal Green
text: Had a blast in the cabin room!  The staff was great and very accommodating for our group. Exciting challenge that definitely put our brains to work and proved to be a great team builder activity for us.  So glad we were able to experience this awesomeness!

resp.text: So glad we were able to provide a fun and challenging experience.  Dig deep and find that inner superhero and come back to do that room!

name: Melissa Rohling
text: We had a great team-building experience with out staff!  We had 2 groups break out of their rooms and then we had lunch brought in for our staff meeting.  Everyone had a great time and we all learned a little more about each other :)

resp.text: Can't wait for you guys to come back!

name: Grant Gravitt
text: The staff was friendly and the rooms were well-decorated and immersive. Our group of 4 very much enjoyed themselves and had lots of laughs trying to get through the puzzles. Will definitely visit again when I get the chance.

resp.text: Many thanks Grant!

name: Tara Harbison
text: We had a FANTASTIC time at Auburn Escape Zones!  Our sales team utilized AEZ as a fun team building activity and we more than happy with the outcome. I have personally recommended this place to several clients who are looking to entertain out of town guests with a fun outing.  Great addition to the Lee County Area!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words.  Come back soon.

name: venus9 Cotton
text: Good customer service

resp.text: Thank you! We pride ourselves on excellent customer service. Be sure to tell your friends about us, & we hope to see you soon!

text:
I went with my family and a friend for my nephew's birthday. We did "Imprisoned". I cannot give enough stars! The staff were so friendly, and it was a very fun atmosphere.

resp.text: We're thrilled to be serving the A/O area and are thankful for customers like you.  Please come again!

name: AHS DECA
text:
The AHS entrepreneurship class visited  Escape Zones , here is what a couple of  my  students said:

Escape zone offered us a way to connect as a team for our tiger cage. Solving problems under stress allowed us to gauge each other’s strengths and test our team compatibility. This experience was crucial for the future of our Entrepreneurship teams.

It was really fun, I'd go again!

I thought that Escape Zones was really fun. It was interesting to work together with people who thought differently from me to try and solve the room. It was an enjoyable experience.

Escape Zones is a pretty fun place to go if you were looking to work with people together as a team and it would have been more fun if we got out!!!!!!!!

I thought it was great. It was challenging in a good way!!!

This was a blast.  It was very good for me to build connections and work with a group. It taught me that depending on fellow group members isn't a bad thing and to completely succeed it requires trust and reliance on one another.

resp.text: We enjoyed having your group out!  What an impressive and well behaved group of young people.  We hope to have future classes come out.  Thank you for your kind remarks?

name: Brent Carpenter
text: What a great experience!  I had the day of the appointment wrong and showed up and no one was there so I called.  One of the owners met us there within 15 minutes.  My daughter, wife, and I had a great time and will do it again!

resp.text: Brent we appreciate your business.  Please come again soon and try out our new rooms!

name: Brittany Edwards
text: Did the cabin. Me and my partner have done a lot of rooms. We did not escape but we both agreed this room was amazing. I do not suggest this for groups smaller than four as it’s challenging and has a lot clues. However the room was amazing looking and the clues were clever and everything went with the story line. Only thing I would have done different is waited until I had a bigger group to do it. They are super friendly and it’s not like any other rooms I have ever seen

resp.text: We appreciate that feedback, Brittany.  So glad you found our room unique and challenging.

name: Will Daniel
text: Great time and great karaoke

resp.text: Thanks for the stars, Will, but this may not be the right place?  No karaoke here, yet...

name: Keandra Baker
text: We didn’t escape but it was so much fun!!!

resp.text: Thanks KB, glad you came in!

name: Ayanna Thomas
text: I went to Auburn Escape Zones for a work team building exercise! I enjoyed working together as a team to find and piece together clues to finish the assigned task. The staff was very professional and offered to be of any assistance before and during the game.

resp.text: We enjoyed your team coming!  What a great group.  Hope you come escape with us again!!

name: Marlena Gillis
text: Our team had the pleasure of going through a room recently. It was so much fun work together as a team and learning about each other's strengths. Staff was friendly and helpful! We are looking forward to going back and trying another room!

resp.text: Loved having your group.  Come back with your family or friends soon!

name: June Milford
text: super fun challenge

resp.text: So glad y'all came in--see you again soon we hope!

name: Taco Master1334
text: I've been meaning to leave a review for these guys for a couple of weeks now, sorry! But I wanted to say these guys were amazing! I used to them to propose to my now finacée and the workers were extremely helpful with everything! They helped me choose which room and where to do it at. They were extremely perfessional and didn't give anything away when it came for me to ask, so she was totally suprised. The room was challenging for her but also a lot of fun! I would highly recommend you use them!

resp.text: That's awesome!  We're so happy to have been a small part of your big day.

name: Mary Isbell
text: Great Experience! We escaped and had so much doing it! The staff is very friendly and made the experience unforgettable! We WILL be back to do the other rooms!

resp.text: Loved having you guys here. Can't wait for you to do the other rooms.

name: Hannah Wright
text: This is the coolest place.  So fun and challenging!  You will want to do all the rooms.

resp.text: Thanks a million, Hannah.  Your opinion means a lot to us.  Hope you'll find your way in to try The Vault.

name: Kirkland Floyd
text: Auburn Escape Zones is by far one of the best things to ever come to town. The experience was challenging, thrilling, and boggled my mind.

resp.text: Kirkland so glad you and tHE  gANG could cone.Hope you come back soon!

name: Heather Johnson
text: Great fun for the entire family! Would absolutely visit again!

resp.text: We hope you will, new rooms available now!

name: Joice Milare
text: We had a Team Building outing at Auburn Escape Zones and had the most fun time! Highly recommended!

resp.text: We enjoyed your team coming!  What a great group.  Hope you come escape with us again!!

name: Mark Summerford
text: I took our office staff to The Escape Zone as a "team-building/get out of the office for some fun" event, and it did not disappoint.  Everyone had a great time, and we all want to come back and try to escape again.

resp.text: Thanks Mark for the kind words!  Glad your group had a good time.  Can't wait for you to come escape with us again!

name: Fenton Hughes
text: Really fun group activity. We did three challenges in one weekend! Very kind staff.

resp.text: Fenton we enjoyed having you all to AUEZ!  Fun seeing you all get better and better with each room.  Have a safe trip back to Utah!  Come see us next time you are in town.

text: Good clean fun. Staff if very friendly. Will be coming back and referring a friend.

resp.text: Many thanks, we'd love to host you again soon.

resp.text: Such a great group.  We enjoyed having the Ambassadors escape with us.  Come back soon.
